effect.diamond_pearl: User’s critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field. If the user has already used focus energy since entering the field, this move will fail. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.platinum: User’s critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field. If the user has already used focus energy since entering the field, this move will fail. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User’s critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field. If the user has already used focus energy since entering the field, this move will fail. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Increases the user’s chance to score a critical hit.
short_effect.platinum: Increases the user’s chance to score a critical hit.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Increases the user’s chance to score a critical hit.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.
flavor_text.platinum: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.
